mapper.insert: insert into pos_nurse(nurnum, num, nurlicensename, nurpath, nurserial, nurrecord, nurcontent) values(pos_nurse_seq.nextval, #{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5}, #{param6})
